tasks.task: Fig Tree Pruning and Hormone Balance
subtasks: Recognize common issues with fig tree fruiting (lack of hormones)
Understand the role of plant hormones in fruiting and flowering
Learn about summer pruning techniques for cherry trees
Explain why fig trees are pruned differently (prune during winter)
Differentiate between heading cuts and thinning cuts for fig trees
Demonstrate proper winter pruning technique (thinning cuts)
Address the impact of severe pruning on hormone balance and fruiting
Discuss the importance of protecting fig trees from winter damage
Emphasize the role of patience with certain fig varieties
